Uses of Class
org.apache.lucene.search.Filter

  • Packages that use Filter 
    Package Description
    org.apache.lucene.search
    Code to search indices.

      Constructors in org.apache.lucene.search with parameters of type Filter 
      Constructor and Description
      CachingWrapperFilter(Filter filter)
      Deprecated. 
      Same as CachingWrapperFilter.CachingWrapperFilter(Filter, FilterCachingPolicy) but enforces the use of the FilterCachingPolicy.CacheOnLargeSegments.DEFAULT policy.
      CachingWrapperFilter(Filter filter, FilterCachingPolicy policy)
      Deprecated. 
      Wraps another filter's result and caches it according to the provided policy.
      FilteredQuery(Query query, Filter filter)
      Deprecated. 
      Constructs a new query which applies a filter to the results of the original query.
      FilteredQuery(Query query, Filter filter, FilteredQuery.FilterStrategy strategy)
      Deprecated. 
      Expert: Constructs a new query which applies a filter to the results of the original query.
